Class Server_Server

java.lang.Object
Server_Server
public class Server_Server
extends java.lang.Object
The class is the implementation of the IO functions that allow the server to interface with the cleint Within this class a server start,

    void closeSocket​(java.net.Socket socket)
    main Function for server, used to allow the server to accept new connections and pass data back to the client

    This Function is used to update the IP adress and Port of the server from the config.con file

    void NewConnection()
    this method add a new user client connection to the server, allowing for communication bettween the two

    this function is used bhy the server when a packet object is received.
    void run()
    Run() method reads the config and then start initialises a socket, it is then in a loops reading data that gets sent to it
    void send​(java.lang.Object toPass, java.net.Socket socket)
    The send function enables the server to pass a serializable object to the cleint, through specifing the object to send and the socket to send to
    void Shutdown()
    This method shuts the server down safely
    void Start()
    The Start Function is used to open the server to a socket that is specifed by the Port variable

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.Object toPass, java.net.Socket socket) throws java.io.IOException
      The send function enables the server to pass a serializable object to the cleint, through specifing the object to send and the socket to send to
      Parameters:
      toPass - an object that is serializable to send to the specified client socket
      socket - a Socket object that specifies the client to send the information to
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • PassCommand

      public void PassCommand​(int command, java.lang.String[] args, java.net.Socket socket) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.text.ParseException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      this function is used bhy the server when a packet object is received. This function takes the packs command and argument, which this function is than able to interrupt into constructing the correct object or passing the args to the relevant function
      Parameters:
      command - an int variable that specifies the function to preform
      args - a list of Strings that are to be passed to the relevant command
      socket - A socket object that specifies the client that requested the following command
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      java.text.ParseException
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
